data.comment: Today's referee, Per Martin Melin, has blown to start the match.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 2, Per Martin Melin awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
Throw-in for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 6, Hacken pushes forward through Daleho Irandust, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Viktor Agardius (Mjallby) has received a first yellow card.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
Throw-in Mjallby.
In the minute 9, Mjallby awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby.
In the minute 11, Mjallby's Jonathan Tamimi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Per Martin Melin awards Hacken a goal kick.
Per Martin Melin signals a Hacken throw-in in Mjallby's half.
In the minute 13, Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Mjallby push forward at Bravida Arena and Jonathan Tamimi gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hacken defence.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
In the minute 14, Mjallby drives forward and Jacob Bergstrom gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Throw-in for Mjallby in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 14, Goal! Mjallby have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Max Watson.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
Goal kick for Mjallby at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 18, Daleho Irandust (Hacken) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Can Hacken capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mjallby's half?
Per Martin Melin awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 21, At Bravida Arena, Patrik Walemark has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Mjallby is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hacken's Patrik Walemark gets in a shot on goal at Bravida Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 24, Throw-in Mjallby.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 28, Daleho Irandust of Hacken smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 31, Per Martin Melin awards Mjallby a goal kick.
In Gothenburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Daleho Irandust of Hacken gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Mjallby at Bravida Arena.
Mjallby to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daleho Irandust gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hacken.
In the minute 36, Attention is being given to Mjallbyâ€™s Moses Ogbu and play has been suspended briefly.
Mjallby's Moses Ogbu looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 37, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Mjallby.
In the minute 38, Alexander Soderlund (Hacken) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Mjallby have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hacken in their own half.
In the minute 39, Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Hacken just outside Mjallby's area.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Hacken.
Hacken's Alexander Soderlund is on target but unsuccessful.
Hacken's Leo Bengtsson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Mjallby defender.
In the minute 42, Leo Bengtsson for Hacken drives towards goal at Bravida Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Mjallby in the half of Hacken.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
In the minute 43, Jesper Gustavsson (Mjallby) gets a yellow card.
Mjallby to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Hacken have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
At Bravida Arena the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Per Martin Melin has blown to start the second-half.
The home team have replaced Patrik Walemark with Ahmed Yasin. This is the first substitution made today by Andreas Alm.
In the minute 47, Leo Bengtsson for Hacken gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Mjallby at Bravida Arena.
Per Martin Melin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
Leo Bengtsson for Hacken has been booked by Per Martin Melin and receives a first yellow card.
Hacken drive upfield and Alexander Soderlund gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Mjallby defender.
In the minute 52, Hacken have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Per Martin Melin signals a Hacken throw-in in Mjallby's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Gothenburg.
In the minute 54, Hacken's Gustav Berggren misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Free kick Mjallby.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hacken are pushing forward but Adam Andersson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, Mjallby have a goal kick.
Goal! Mjallby extend their lead to 0-2 thanks to a Moses Ogbu header.
Jacob Bergstrom with an assist there.
In the minute 60, Goal! Daleho Irandust pulls one back to make it 1-2.
Great play from Alexander Soderlund to set up the goal.
Hacken's Godswill Ekpolo is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Mjallby to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Mjallby's half?
In the minute 64, Free kick for Mjallby in the half of Hacken.
Johan Hammar is replacing Rasmus Lindgren for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In Gothenburg Hacken attack through Ahmed Yasin. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Gothenburg.
The away team replace Moses Ogbu with Erik Parsson.
Free kick for Mjallby in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Leo Bengtsson of Hacken smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Alexander Soderlund's header is off-target for Hacken.
In the minute 69, Per Martin Melin awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Mjallby are coming forward and Jonathan Tamimi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Mjallby.
Important block from the Mjallby defence as Leo Bengtsson fires in a strike for Hacken.
Leo Bengtsson of Hacken gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 77, Per Martin Melin awards Mjallby a goal kick.
Hacken pushes forward through Leo Bengtsson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Per Martin Melin signals a throw-in for Hacken, close to Mjallby's area.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Hacken at Bravida Arena.
Hacken make their third substitution with Nikola Gulan replacing Adam Andersson.
Marcus Lantz (Mjallby) is making a second substitution, with Adam Petersson replacing Jesper Gustavsson.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Mjallby.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nikola Gulan is booked for the home team.
In the minute 83, Hacken's Ahmed Yasin has been booked in Gothenburg.
Goal! Hacken draw level to 2-2 through a Gustav Berggren header.
That's a fine assist from Daleho Irandust.
In the minute 85, Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Per Martin Melin signals a Mjallby throw-in in Hacken's half.
In the minute 87, Free kick in a good position for Mjallby!
Mjallby drives forward and Max Watson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Mjallby have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Mjallby.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Gothenburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Mjallby goal kick.
Free kick Mjallby.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Mjallby's Besard Sabovic breaks free at Bravida Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Hacken have a goal kick.
Throw-in Mjallby.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Per Martin Melin.
Hacken pushes forward through Joona Toivio, whose finish on goal is saved.
Hacken's Alexander Soderlund goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Per Martin Melin signals a free kick to Mjallby in their own half.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Godswill Ekpolo.
Viktor Lundberg is replacing Godswill Ekpolo for the home team.
